trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around March 9th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsEvery night approximately at 8 p.m. numerous lighted objects appear and stay there until approximately 6 a.m. They move about freely . One of them is bright and the others are dim.We happened to look up at the sky. The way it was moving. My son and I saw it. Not knowing what it is. Hard to get pictures of this have to see it in reality. When it left around at daylight.
Summary: Numerous objects appear every night at the same time .
